name: International Conference on Plant Science
content: The International Conference on Plant Science Congress will take place in Osaka, Japan on July 19-20, 2021, and will provide essential keynote addresses, oral presentations, workshops/symposia, poster presentations, and exhibitions. The conference revolves around the topic of "Exploring Plant Science." Plant Science Congress is the premier event that brings together a dynamic group of scholars, researchers, and decision-makers from academia and industry from around the world to share their experience, skills, and scientific developments in order to create a world-class plant science conference.
